company.name: Riyah Al-Jaleed Central Air Conditioning Est.
company.tagline: Your Trusted Partner in Central Air Conditioning Solutions

hero.title: Central Air Conditioning Solutions with Global Engineering Standards
hero.subtitle: Over a decade of expertise in designing, implementing, and maintaining central HVAC systems for commercial and residential projects across Saudi Arabia

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: A Leading Engineering Company in Central Air Conditioning
about.description: Riyah Al-Jaleed Central Air Conditioning Est. was founded to provide comprehensive HVAC solutions that meet the highest standards of quality and efficiency. Operating within Isa Bin Aid Al-Hajlah Engineering Consulting Company, we bring deep engineering expertise and the capability to execute major projects.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To provide comfortable and healthy environments through highly efficient air conditioning systems while maintaining the highest standards of quality and safety.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be the first choice in the central air conditioning sector in Saudi Arabia, known for engineering excellence and reliability.

values.title: Our Values
values.qualityText: We are committed to the highest quality standards in every project
values.reliabilityText: We build long-term relationships with our clients
values.expertiseText: A specialized engineering team with extensive experience
values.innovationText: We keep pace with the latest technologies in air conditioning

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive HVAC Solutions with Professional Standards
services.description: We offer a complete range of central air conditioning services including design, supply, installation, and maintenance

centralAC.title: Central Air Conditioning Systems
centralAC.description: Design and implementation of complete central air conditioning systems for commercial and residential buildings using the latest technologies

installation.title: Installation & Implementation
installation.description: A specialized technical team for installing and commissioning air conditioning systems according to the highest safety and quality standards

maintenance.title: Preventive & Corrective Maintenance
maintenance.description: Comprehensive periodic maintenance programs and rapid repair services to ensure continuous system operation

commercial.title: Commercial Solutions
commercial.description: Specialized air conditioning solutions for commercial complexes, offices, hotels, and hospitals

residential.title: Residential Solutions
residential.description: Central air conditioning systems for villas and residential apartments with designs suitable for all spaces

consulting.title: Engineering Consulting
consulting.description: Consulting services in HVAC system design, energy efficiency improvement, and contractor coordination

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.subtitle: A Track Record of Achievements
projects.description: We take pride in successfully executing hundreds of projects across various sectors

project4.title: Food Industries Factory
project4.description: Industrial cooling system with temperature and humidity control
